channel.title: Please help me with server constant server crashing
channel.description: I can't go 10 min without the server crashing tell me if I am doing anything wrong or tell me how i could fix the problem please. First thing i do is compile the server and run it with lamez's compiler. Then I log on and play/ help people then when i log out the server bascially crashes and people are forced off server. Another problem I have is people connecting to my server and the new server advertisement almost always says my server is offline either though I have like 3 people playing. :| :| :confused: :| :|

item.title: Please help me with server constant server crashing
item.dc:creator: @dawn_killer dawn killer
item.description:
@dawn_killer wrote:

I can’t go 10 min without the server crashing tell me if I am doing anything wrong or tell me how i could fix the problem please. First thing i do is compile the server and run it with lamez’s compiler. Then I log on and play/ help people then when i log out the server bascially crashes and people are forced off server. Another problem I have is people connecting to my server and the new server advertisement almost always says my server is offline either though I have like 3 people playing.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me with server constant server crashing
